name: Chinatown Community Development Center (CCDC)
description: CDCC provides tenant assistance for low-income Asian communities, including housing and tenant association organizing. They also provide referrals to attorneys and other professionals. Additionally, there are housing opportunities available through CCDC. More information is located in the Housing Opportunities section of this manual. Languages offered are Cantonese and Mandarin.
